title: Complete Horror Bundle
description: The Complete Horror Bundle: 6 dark music packs with 84 unique tracks and 160 jump scares & stingers.
longDescription:
Welcome to the Complete Horror Bundle. This extensive collection of horror, thriller, and dark mystery music combines six music asset packs: Pathogen, Whispers, Occult, Miasma, Mysterium, and Deathvox. 

Complete Horror Bundle is a terrifying collection of game music designed to immerse players in the darkest corners of fear. Featuring 84 spine-chilling compositions and 160 stingers/jump scares, this bundle spans the full spectrum of horror themes, from psychological tension and supernatural terror to cosmic dread and bio-horror.

Key Features: 

Diverse Themes: Each pack brings a distinctive flavour of horror, suited for different types of terrifying environments and gameplay moments.

  • Pathogen: Sci-fi horror with alien, space, and infection-driven themes.
  • Whispers: Atmospheric and unnerving soundscapes filled with ominous, subtle terror.
  • Occult: Dark, arcane mysteries featuring orchestral dread and ancient rituals.
  • Miasma: Dense, fog-like audio atmospheres, perfect for slow-building tension.
  • Mysterium: Noir-inspired, mystery-laden tracks full of secrets and sinister intrigue.
  • Deathvox: Jump scares and stingers to shock and surprise.

High-Quality Audio: Professionally composed and recorded, using industry standard software to ensure top-tier audio quality for your game.

Versatility: Perfect for horror, thriller, and suspense-driven games across various sub-genres. Composed with a blend of orchestral and electronic elements covering a wide set of use-cases. 


Elevate your horror game’s soundtrack with the Complete Horror Bundle and envelop your players in an unforgettable world of fear and suspense.


Listen to the tracks here:

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  5 music asset packs with 84 compositions
  •  1 jump scare & stingers asset pack with 160 tracks

Number of Audio Wavs: 244

Number of Audio Cues: 244

Sample rate: 16-bit/44.1kHz & 24-bit/48kHz

Bit rate: 1411 kbps & 2116 kbps

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1 hour 56 minutes 52 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Readme files have been included for all packs contained within.
